name: eleventy-base
description: This is the starting point for Eleventy projects

scripts.build:images: npm run clear:images && npm run copy:images
scripts.serve:images: npm run build:images && npm run watch:images
scripts.build:stylesDev: npm run clear:styles && npm run build:scssDev && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:stylesProd: npm run clear:styles && npm run build:scssProd && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.serve:styles: npm run build:stylesDev && npm run watch:styles
scripts.build: npm run clear:all && npm run build:assetsProd && npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.start: parallelshell 'npm run serve:site' 'npm run serve:images' 'npm run serve:styles'
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' --tag '%s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json

author: Martin Underhill
